title: Inside Europe 14.07.2022
description: The race to replace Boris Johnson as the UK’s next prime minister, Germans worry about freezing this winter, and why some of those canned tomatoes from Italy are so cheap. Also: meet the American actor who left Hollywood to become lord of Downton Shabby and how the Isle of Skye’s natural wonders are both a blessing and a curse.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Inside Europe, Helen Seeney, Boris Johnson, Conservative Party leader, Germany heating costs, energy crisis, Downton Shabby, canned tomatoes, Yazidi refugees, migrant workers, Isle of Skye
